memberdef.argsstring: (float minv, float maxv, int symmetric, float *out_scale, int8_t *out_zero)
memberdef.name: ie_act_i8_params_from_minmax

briefdescription.para: Compute per-tensor INT8 parameters from min/max.

detaileddescription.para: The returned scale is strictly positive. If symmetric is non-zero, zero_point is set to 0 and the scale is derived from max(|minv|,|maxv|)/127. Otherwise, asymmetric parameters are derived to map minv→-128 and maxv→127.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *src, int8_t *dst, size_t n, ie_act_i8_params params, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: ie_quantize_act_int8

briefdescription.para: Quantize activations to INT8 using per-tensor parameters.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to destination INT8 (same length as src).

memberdef.argsstring: (const int8_t *src, float *dst, size_t n, ie_act_i8_params params)
memberdef.name: ie_dequantize_act_int8

briefdescription.para: Dequantize INT8 activations to float using per-tensor parameters.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *src, size_t n, size_t group_size, int symmetric, float *out_scales, int8_t *out_zeros)
memberdef.name: ie_act_i8_group_params_from_data

briefdescription.para: Compute per-group INT8 parameters for src.

detaileddescription.para: Partitions src into contiguous groups of size group_size (the last group may be shorter) and computes parameters for each group using ie_act_i8_params_from_minmax with the chosen symmetry.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *src, int8_t *dst, size_t n, size_t group_size, const float *scales, const int8_t *zeros, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: ie_quantize_act_int8_per_group

memberdef.argsstring: (const int8_t *src, float *dst, size_t n, size_t group_size, const float *scales, const int8_t *zeros)
memberdef.name: ie_dequantize_act_int8_per_group

briefdescription.para: Dequantize per-group INT8 activations to float.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *src, uint8_t *dst, size_t n, ie_fp8_format fmt)
memberdef.name: ie_quantize_act_fp8

briefdescription.para: Quantize activations to FP8 (E4M3 or E5M2).

detaileddescription.para:
Non-finite inputs:
E4M3: saturated to max finite.
E5M2: pass through to Inf/NaN encodings when possible.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t *src, float *dst, size_t n, ie_fp8_format fmt)
memberdef.name: ie_dequantize_act_fp8

briefdescription.para: Dequantize FP8 bytes to floats (E4M3 or E5M2).
Activation quantization utilities (INT8 and FP8) for runtime paths.

detaileddescription.para: This module provides fast, allocation-free routines to quantize and dequantize activations to INT8 and FP8 formats. It supports both per-tensor and per-group (blockwise) parameterization for INT8, and two FP8 formats (E4M3 and E5M2).

Design goals:
No dynamic allocation; all buffers owned by caller.
Cache-friendly traversal with plain pointer arithmetic.
Deterministic, saturating conversions.
Small and easily inlinable helpers for hot loops.

Notes on FP8:
FP8 here implements software encoders/decoders for E4M3 and E5M2. The E4M3 variant is treated as finite-only (overflow saturates to the largest finite representable value). E5M2 supports Inf/NaN round-tripping from IEEE-754 float where possible; non-finite inputs to E4M3 are saturated to max finite.
Thread-safety: all functions are pure with respect to input pointers and are thread-safe if buffers do not alias.
